Chi tit mn n

Ph B c Bit l mn n truyn thng c ci tin vi cng thc c quyn, s dng nguyn liu tht b ti cao cp v bnh ph dai mm. Mt t ph khng th thiu trong ba n, ph hp vi mi dp: ba sng nhanh, tra vn phng hay ti gia nh. n gin nhng m , truyn thng m vn hin i.

T ph ca chng ti c ch bin t tht b ti v nc dng hm 12 gi, mang n tri nghim m thc tuyt vi nht. "Ph B c Bit" l la chn cho nhng ai tm kim mt mn n ngon ming, b dng v m cht Vit.
  • Hng v m , thm ngon t nc dng hm xng b, vt tri so vi ph thng thng
  • Nguyn liu ti sch, m bo v sinh, khng cht bo qun, an tm thng thc
  • Thong v vi rau ti v gia v t nhin, mang li cm gic nh nhng, d chu

Ph B c Bit - S ci tin t truyn thng

Mt t ph thay i cch bn thng thc m thc Vit

Ph c Bit vi nc dng m v hng v vt tri. Thm - Ngon ngay t ming u tin

CHNG TI V NHNG T PH C BIT

3 ln ci tin cng thc t 02/2023 n 03/2025 mang n t ph hon ho nht. Vi Ph B c Bit:

  • Tinh chnh thi gian hm nc dng ln 12 gi.
  • Chn lc tht b ti t ngun cung cp uy tn.
  • Cn chnh gia v cho ph hp vi mi khu v.

V chng ti t ho gii thiu Ph B c Bit - mang n hng v m , thm ngon v tri nghim n ung tuyt vi nht.

Chng ti tin rng vi s tn tm trong tng khu ch bin, Ph B c Bit s l mn n khng th thiu trong la chn ca bn.
